content:
I'm glad to hear that you're enjoying Spotify's Discover Weekly playlist! However, I should clarify that I'm a large language model, I don't have personal experiences or access to your personal preferences or playlists. I'm here to provide general information and answer questions to the best of my ability.

That being said, it's great to hear that you're discovering new music and enjoying the tracks on the Discover Weekly playlist! Spotify's algorithms do a great job of curating personalized playlists based on users' listening habits, and it's always exciting to find new music that resonates with you.

If you're looking for more music recommendations or have specific questions about music, feel free to ask, and I'll do my best to help!
